message.body: Hi! I know I've been swamped ! I'm opening up a gallery at front and girard most likely !

I work for a gallery downtown now and juggle lots of pt jobs and just had a painting residency so things have been nuts! Inherited a house in Romania that I'd like to turn into an artist residency too so I've just been feeling ~crazy~ but happy. How are you?!!!
Do you have plans for this week at all? Maybe we can meet up some evening !

Wowowowow thats really cool! When does the gallery open? We haven't been up to to terrible much just house stuff. I may be able to swing something this week, depends on what you were thinking of doing.
